messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please organize a table showing the champion teams of each of the European top five football leagues of 5 seasons from the 2020–21 season to the 2024–25 season, along with the Player of the Season (based on Sofascore ratings) for each season. For each player, include their club at the time and their rating score (keep two digits after the decimal point).

Please present the organized data in a single Markdown table format, do not leave empty cells.
The column headers should be:
League, Season, Champion Club, MVP Player, Club, Rating.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To construct this table, I need to gather the champion clubs for each of the top five European football leagues from the 2020-21 season to the 2024-25 season, along with the MVP players based on Sofascore ratings for each season, including their clubs and ratings.

I'll start by determining which leagues constitute the "top five" in Europe. Typically, these are:
1. English Premier League (EPL)
2. La Liga
3. Serie A
4. Bundesliga
5. Ligue 1

Next, I'll collect the data for each season within these leagues.
</think>

<search> champions of top five european football leagues 2020-21 to 2024-25 </search>

Search query: champions of top five european football leagues 2020-21 to 2024-25
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_(association_football)):
Big Five (association football) - Wikipedia Big Five (association football) · England (Premier League) · Germany (Bundesliga) · Spain (La Liga) · Italy (Serie A) · France (Ligue 1).

[Doc 2](https://www.facebook.com/groups/290350823474278/posts/691272160048807/):
Last five champions of top European leagues - Facebook Paris Saint-Germain, French champion Bayer Leverkusen, German champion Real Madrid, Spanish champion Inter Milan, Italian champion ...

[Doc 3](https://www.uefa.com/nationalassociations/uefarankings/country/):
Country coefficients | UEFA rankings About the ranking. The rankings are based on the results of each association's clubs in European competition (in the UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League ...

Based on the above documents, I've confirmed that the top five leagues are EPL, Bundesliga, La Liga, Serie A, and Ligue 1.

Now let's proceed to collect the champions and MVPs for each season from these leagues.

<search> 2020-21 to 2024-25 season champions and MVPs of top five European football leagues </search>

Search query: 2020-21 to 2024-25 season champions and MVPs of top five European football leagues
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.facebook.com/groups/livescoreandsportsupdate247/posts/4063056303944444/):
2024/25 European competition winners announced - Facebook The winners of the 2024/25 European competitions: ○ PSG - Champions League ○ Spurs - Europa League ○ Chelsea - Conference League.

[Doc 2](https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/history/seasons/2025/statistics/):
Season 2024/25 Stats | UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Visit UEFA.com for comprehensive player, club and competition stats for UEFA Champions League 2024/25 including goals, matches played, and many more.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_(association_football)):
Big Five (association football) - Wikipedia The Big Five refers to the association football markets of England, France, Germany, Italy and Spain. As of 2025, they are the five European leaders in size ...

I need specific details on champions and MVPs per season. Let’s search for detailed yearly MVPs and champions.

<search> 2020-21 to 2024-25 season champions and MVPs of top five European football leagues </search>

Search query: 2020-21 to 2024-25 season champions and MVPs of top five European football leagues
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_(association_football)):
Big Five (association football) - Wikipedia The Big Five refers to the association football markets of England, France, Germany, Italy and Spain. As of 2025, they are the five European leaders in size ...

[Doc 2](https://www.facebook.com/groups/livescoreandsportsupdate247/posts/4063056303944444/):
2024/25 European competition winners announced - Facebook The winners of the 2024/25 European competitions: ○ PSG - Champions League ○ Spurs - Europa League ○ Chelsea - Conference League.

[Doc 3](https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/history/seasons/2025/statistics/):
Season 2024/25 Stats | UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Visit UEFA.com for comprehensive player, club and competition stats for UEFA Champions League 2024/25 including goals, matches played, and many more.

I found a document for 2024/25 Champions League winners, but MVPs and champions per league are scattered. Let's focus on MVPs:

<search> 2020-21 to 2024-25 season Player of the Season based on Sofascore ratings for top five European football leagues </search>

Search query: 2020-21 to 2024-25 season Player of the Season based on Sofascore ratings for top five European football leagues
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.sofascore.com/news/sofascore-player-of-the-season-2024-25-full-list-of-winners/):
Sofascore Player of the Season 2024/25: Full List of Winners Based on our trusted Sofascore Rating and detailed match-by-match stats, these are the top-rated players who led their leagues with consistent excellence.

[Doc 2](https://www.reddit.com/r/NorskFotball/comments/1prlhs4/sofascore_highest_rated_players_in_each_of_the/):
[Sofascore] Highest rated players in each of the top 5 leagues so far ... [Sofascore] Highest rated players in top 5 leagues this season: Kane, Haaland, Mbappe, Vitinha, Modric. Are the player ratings on FOTMOB and ...

[Doc 3](https://www.sofascore.com/news/sofascore-player-of-the-season-race-whos-leading-europes-top-five-leagues/):
Player of the Season Race: Who Leads Europe's Top 5 - Sofascore Premier League: Haaland leads again · LaLiga: Mbappé dominates in Spain · Bundesliga: Kane unstoppable in Germany · Serie A: Modrić's renaissance.

I'll use the above to compile the table.
</think>
